headline.0: US Airways Kicks Blind Man Off Plane and Employs the 'Ostrich Strategy' to Public's Outrage
headline.1: Thousands March Outside the UN Climate Talks in Warsaw, Poland

short_description.0: I hope I'm asking this question on behalf of the majority of my peers, but which school of thought produced the Ostrich strategy in regards to responding to customer service, and ultimately, public relations issues?
short_description.1: Thousands of people from around the world took the streets outside the UN Climate Talks in Warsaw today to demand climate justice.
